Class BuildExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.command.BuildExecutor

extends Object
    Used to build a given set of targets.

      • buildTargets

        public ExitCode buildTargets​(Iterable<BuildTarget> targetsToBuild,
                             Optional<Path> pathToBuildReport)
                      throws Exception
        Builds the given targets synchronously. Failures are printed to the EventBus.
        Parameters:
        targetsToBuild -
        Returns:
        exit code.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getCachingBuildEngine

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Destroy any resources associated with this builder. Call this once only, when all buildLocallyAndReturnExitCode calls have finished.
